name: Color De-Stack
description:
More simple, more casual, but still fun to play. Color DeStack idea is to create a sort of competition for the best score, I wanted the game to be difficult and the plays not too take too much time. It wasn't really too hard to develop, but I wanted to try out some new features, like 2D world space animations and detecting touches on 3D objects and it was a success! Hope you enjoy it.

Google Play integration : Earn points by reaching objectives and compare your score with the entire world in the leaderboards.

Facebook integration : Share your results on the newly created facebook page!
